short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for Sports Card Analysis

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Assess quality
Using computer vision, our mobile app analyzes the quality of your sports cards.  

Real-time pricing 
Aggregating pricing sources from all over the web, we then provide you real-time pricing details of your card, allowing you to see what itâ€™s selling for as raw or graded from the top 3 grading agencies and live prices directly on eBay. 

Sync to app
Once your card is assessed, you will see it appear in your account on the mobile app as well. 

Providing transparency and due diligence to the hobby you know and love.
